name: TT (CharlesLamarque, Blowa)
description:
Made during the #PAJGameJam by Maxime Littiere and Charles Lamarque

Morph into a sword and dash through baloons in this challenging little platformer.

You might (will) encounter a lot of bugs.

Controls (MOUSE and KEYBOARD required)

Q (or A), D : to move left and right

Space : to jump

Mouse left click : morphing

Mouse cursor : aiming
